Counter Strike: Global Offensive is a game that seems more like a rework than a new game, but it don´t make it not even a little bit worse, the graphics are good, playability its unforgettable, it makes you remember the old times, you can do enjoy the game by yourself as well as with friends. The market works very nice, the prices are fair. Liked the older one, and i it seems that a lot changed, but the fun, its the same!

I've accumulated a small amount of playtime, and I must say that this is my favorite PC shooter of all time. Very competitive and fun. Only complaint is that my PC can't run it very smoothly, so it makes it ta bit harder. Wish the game was built for a slightly weaker PC, but hey, its still great.
